modal.title: Andrew Rattana
modal.description: Welcome to my site! I'm a web developer that specializes in a broad range of areas: from web design & development, to motion graphics & illustration, to traditional pen and paper art. Last but not least I love programming and solving both design and coding problems. Please enjoy my site and if you have any questions don't hesitate to send me a message.

timeline.description: Offering only the best tech news and reviews!

modal.title: Lighsing Tech News
modal.description: Front end design and development of a self-made project of a tech news center.

timeline.description: After Effects animations with front end design!

modal.title: AE Phone Animations
modal.description: Creating modern vector phone animations with After Effects and designing a minimal site platform for videos.

timeline.description: A tournament management and hosting application microsite.

modal.title: BracketSC2 Microsite
modal.description: BracketSC2 is a Starcraft 2 tournament management and hosting application that enables you to easily host tournaments without worrying about the techinical side of things.

modal.title: Todo List Application
modal.description: A minimalistic todo list application that features drag and drop for setting priorities for your items.

timeline.description: Get the latest news, trends and happenings in music!

modal.title: MusicSky
modal.description: A concept website I designed for the latest trends and news in music, focusing on clean and modern design trends.

timeline.description: Attack of the retreating invisible cows!

modal.title: The Cow Warriors
modal.description: A logo I designed for my team of 4 in a fierce corporate battle royale. These were printed on t-shirts and the title remained as Attack of the Retreating Invisible Cows!

modal.title: Student Handbook 2012
modal.description: I made a design for the Student Handbook 2012 competition at my community college, unfortunately it ended in 2nd place.

modal.title: Student Handbook 2013
modal.description: I made a design for the Student Handbook 2013 competition at my community college, unfortunately it ended in 2nd place... again.

modal.title: Student Handbook 2014
modal.description: I made a design for the Student Handbook 2014 competition at my community college, unfortunately this one didn't place, looking back I think a warrior holding two giant axes probably wasn't a good idea...

timeline.description: A report cover page about user application data and statistics

modal.title: End User Report
modal.description: The cover page for a report I designed for Info-Tech Research Group for corporations to measure how well they're users are managing applications

modal.title: Car Dashboard HUD
modal.description: A concept design I created of a futuristic car's heads up display. Focusing heavily on sci-fi interfaces.

timeline.description: A modern and minimalistic music player.

modal.title: Music Player
modal.description: A concept design I created of a music player application.

modal.title: Media Player
modal.description: A concept design I created of a media player application. Aimed to be extremely minimal and only have the required tools for playing any type of media.
